channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [LT] L&T Wins Large Order for Hydrocarbon Onshore Business from Petronet LNG
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Larsen & Toubro Limited (L&T) has won a large order from Petronet LNG, a joint venture promoted by four leading PSUs, for engineering, procurement, construction and commissioning of a Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG)/Ethane double-wall storage tank and a Propane double-wall storage tank at the Dahej Petrochemical Complex in Gujarat. The scope also includes Ethane and Propane handling and despatch facilities to support the Propane Dehydrogenation and Polypropylene plant. This project is part of Indiaâ€™s first petrochemical complex integrating cold energy utilisation from an LNG terminal and is expected to contribute towards bridging the domestic polypropylene demand-supply gap. The order reflects the industryâ€™s enduring confidence in L&Tâ€™s proven ability to deliver projects within stringent timelines, while maintaining an unwavering commitment to excellence, safety and quality.

  • L&Tâ€™s Hydrocarbon Onshore business vertical has won a large order from Petronet LNG.
  • The project comprises engineering, procurement, construction and commissioning of a Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG)/Ethane double-wall storage tank and a Propane double-wall storage tank.
  • The project is part of Indiaâ€™s first petrochemical complex integrating cold energy utilisation from an LNG terminal.
  • The order reflects the industryâ€™s enduring confidence in L&Tâ€™s proven ability to deliver projects within stringent timelines.
  • The project aligns with Government of Indiaâ€™s Aatmanirbhar Bharat initiative by strengthening indigenous petrochemical manufacturing capacity.

Company: LARSEN & TOUBRO LTD. | Category: New Launch

item.title: [RELTD] Ravindra Energy Q3 Business Update: 187 MW Renewable Energy Generation, 55 Vehicles Sold, INR 296 Crore Financial Assistance Sanctioned
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Ravindra Energy Ltd has announced its business update for the 3rd quarter ended December 31, 2025. The company's Renewable Energy Generation business has reported an operating capacity of 187 MW DC. The Agri Feeder Projects in Karnataka have generated as per the target, and the Rooftop projects and Wind asset have also contributed 6 MW. The Mukhya Mantri Saurya Krishi Vahini Yojana (MSKVY) Phase 1 projects have been fully commissioned, and generation income is as per the target. The company is also constructing 60 MW DC under MSKVY Phase 2, expected to be commissioned before March 26. The Renewable Energy Generation business has 235 MW DC under development/pipeline. The Energy in Motion business has sold 55 vehicles in Q3 and has 8 swap stations expected to be commissioned by March 26. The company has also received financial assistance in the form of various credit facilities of INR 296 Crore and a hedge facility of INR 32 Crore from YES Bank Limited.

  • Renewable Energy Generation business reports 187 MW DC operating capacity
  • Agri Feeder Projects in Karnataka generate as per target
  • MSKVY Phase 1 projects fully commissioned, generation income as per target
  • 235 MW DC under development/pipeline
  • Energy in Motion business sells 55 vehicles in Q3, 8 swap stations expected by March 26
  • INR 296 Crore financial assistance sanctioned from YES Bank Limited

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Ravindra Energy Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [ANDHRAPET] Andhra Petrochemicals Ltd. to Approve Q3 Results on Feb 4, 2026; Trading Window Closed
item.description:
Andhra Petrochemicals Ltd. has announced that a Board Meeting will be held on February 4, 2026, to consider and approve the un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months period ended 31st December 2025. The trading window for dealing in the Equity Shares of the Company is closed from January 1, 2026, to February 6, 2026, in connection with the aforesaid Board Meeting.

  • Andhra Petrochemicals Ltd. to hold a Board Meeting on February 4, 2026
  • The meeting will consider and approve the un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months period ended 31st December 2025
  • Trading Window for dealing in the Equity Shares of the Company is closed from January 1, 2026, to February 6, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: ANDHRA PETROCHEMICALS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [NECLIFE] Nectar Lifesciences Completes Buyback of 3 Crore Equity Shares at INR 27 Each
item.description:
Nectar Lifesciences Ltd has completed its buyback of 3,00,00,000 (Three Crore Only) fully paid-up Equity Shares of face value of INR 1/- each at a price of INR 27/- per Equity Share. The buyback was implemented through the Tender Offer route and was completed on January 13, 2026. The total amount utilized in the buyback was INR 81,00,00,000/- (Indian Rupees Eighty One Crore Only), excluding Transaction Cost.

  • Nectar Lifesciences completes buyback of 3 Crore Equity Shares
  • Buyback implemented through Tender Offer route
  • Buyback price: INR 27/- per Equity Share
  • Total amount utilized: INR 81,00,00,000/-
  • Completion date: January 13, 2026

Company: NECTAR LIFESCIENCES LTD. | Category: Buyback

item.title: [SHREDIGCEM] Shree Digvijay Cement Open Offer Extended to January 19, 2026
item.description:
Axis Capital Ltd, the Manager to the Offer, has announced an extension of the Tendering Period for the Open Offer of Shree Digvijay Cement Company Ltd. The Offer, initially proposed to close on January 16, 2026, will now close on January 19, 2026. This extension is due to a trading holiday declared on account of the municipal corporation elections in Maharashtra on January 15, 2026. The Public Notice has been published in various newspapers.

  • Shree Digvijay Cement Open Offer extended to January 19, 2026
  • Extension due to a trading holiday on account of municipal corporation elections in Maharashtra
  • Public Notice published in various newspapers
  • Axis Capital Ltd is the Manager to the Offer

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SHREE DIGVIJAY CEMENT CO.LTD.-$ | Category: Open Offer

item.title: [SMARTWORKS] Smartworks Coworking Spaces Ltd Enters Public Markets, Maintains Leadership Momentum
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Smartworks Coworking Spaces Ltd, a leading provider of enterprise workspace infrastructure, has entered the public markets, reflecting years of disciplined execution and a focus on building at national scale. The company operates at the intersection of flexibility and infrastructure, serving long-term demand through large, fully managed campuses. Over the past year, Smartworks has maintained leadership momentum, strengthened its footprint, improved demand visibility, and deepened relationships with large enterprises. The company's growth is increasingly visible and pre-sold, driven by demand pull rather than speculative supply. As the platform scales, every incremental square foot improves economics, reinforcing the self-sustaining nature of the model. Smartworks is now moving from growth funding to growth monetisation, supported by a maturing portfolio, expanding multi-city client relationships, and an ecosystem designed for multi-decade relevance.

  • Smartworks Coworking Spaces Ltd enters public markets
  • Maintained leadership momentum while strengthening footprint
  • Growing share of growth from existing enterprise clients
  • Increasingly visible and pre-sold growth
  • Moving from growth funding to growth monetisation

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Smartworks Coworking Spaces Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [INDUSTOWER] Indus Towers Ltd Establishes Subsidiaries in Nigeria and Zambia
item.description:
Indus Towers Limited has announced the incorporation of step-down subsidiaries in Nigeria and Zambia. Indus Towers Management FZE and Indus Towers Investment FZE, wholly owned subsidiaries of Indus Towers Limited, have incorporated Indus Towers Nigeria Limited and Indus Towers Infra Zambia Limited, respectively. The new entities will carry on the business of establishing, erecting, installing, operating, managing, and maintaining telecommunication towers, masts, poles, antennas, and other related infrastructure for telecommunication, broadcasting, or wireless communication purposes.

  • Indus Towers Limited has incorporated step-down subsidiaries in Nigeria and Zambia.
  • The new entities will be involved in the business of establishing, erecting, installing, operating, managing, and maintaining telecommunication towers.
  • The contribution to initial share capital will be made in cash at face value.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Indus Towers Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [KDDL] KDDL Ltd Subsidiary's Name Changed to Kamla Business Services Limited
item.description:
KDDL Ltd has announced that the name of its subsidiary company, previously known as 'Kamla Tesio Dials Limited', has been changed to 'Kamla Business Services Limited' with effect from 14th January, 2026. This change has been approved by the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA).

  • KDDL Ltd's subsidiary company name changed to Kamla Business Services Limited
  • Change effective from 14th January, 2026
  • Approval received from the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA)

item.title: [MAJESAUT] Majestic Auto Ltd Receives Order Modifying GST Demand from â‚¹ 9,56,04,387 to â‚¹ 3,39,238
item.description:
Majestic Auto Ltd has received an order from the Additional Commissioner Grade-II Appeal, GST Appellate Authority, Gautam Budha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, modifying the earlier GST demand of â‚¹ 9,56,04,387 to â‚¹ 3,39,238. The order was passed pursuant to an appeal filed by the company on December 30, 2023, against an order of Deputy Commissioner (GST) that raised a demand of â‚¹ 956.04 Lakhs on the company in December 2023 for the financial year 2017-18. The appeal has been accepted by the Appellate Authority, and the demand has been modified to â‚¹ 3,39,238. The contingent liability appearing in the Notes to Accounts of the company on this account will stand extinguished. The other expenses will increase by â‚¹ 3,39,238, and the Profit before tax & Profit after tax will reduce by the same amount during the current financial year 2025-26. No finding of deliberate violation has been recorded by the Appellate Authority.

  • Majestic Auto Ltd receives order modifying GST demand from â‚¹ 9,56,04,387 to â‚¹ 3,39,238
  • Order passed pursuant to an appeal filed by the company on December 30, 2023
  • No finding of deliberate violation recorded by the Appellate Authority
  • Contingent liability appearing in the Notes to Accounts of the company to be extinguished
  • Other expenses to increase by â‚¹ 3,39,238 and Profit before tax & Profit after tax to reduce by the same amount during the current financial year 2025-26

Company: MAJESTIC AUTO LTD.-$ | Category: Legal

item.title: [SUNPHARMA] Sun Pharma Announces the Availability of UNLOXCYTâ„¢ (cosibelimab-ipdl) for Advanced Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma (aCSCC)
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Limited has announced the availability of UNLOXCYTâ„¢ (cosibelimab-ipdl) for the treatment of adults in the U.S. with metastatic cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma (mCSCC) or locally advanced CSCC (laCSCC) who are not candidates for curative surgery or curative radiation. UNLOXCYT offers a balanced treatment approach with long-term data confirming durable efficacy and a proven tolerability profile. It has a multifaceted mechanism of action that helps restore the adaptive immune response and engages the innate immune system while preserving PD-L2 signaling.

  • Sun Pharma announces the availability of UNLOXCYTâ„¢ (cosibelimab-ipdl) for the treatment of adults with metastatic cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma (mCSCC) or locally advanced CSCC (laCSCC) who are not candidates for curative surgery or curative radiation.
  • UNLOXCYT offers a balanced treatment approach with long-term data confirming durable efficacy and a proven tolerability profile.
  • UNLOXCYT has a multifaceted mechanism of action that helps restore the adaptive immune response and engages the innate immune system while preserving PD-L2 signaling.
  • UNLOXCYT is now available in the U.S. for healthcare professionals to prescribe.
  • Sun Pharma is committed to ensuring access from day one with the UNLOXCYT SUPPORTâ„¢ patient access and affordability program.
